metadata.description: Username for the Virtual Machine
Password for the Virtual Machine
Name for FortiGate virtual appliances (A & B will be appended to the end of each respectively)
Identifies whether to to use PAYG (on demand licensing) or BYOL license model (where license is purchased separately)
Only 6.x has the A/P HA feature currently
Virtual Machine size selection - must be F4 or other instance that supports 4 NICs
Accelerated Networking enables direct connection between the VM and network card. Only available on 2 CPU D/DSv2 and F/Fs and 4 CPU D/Dsv3, E/Esv3, Fsv2, Lsv2, Ms/Mms and Ms/Mmsv2
Choose between an existing or new public IP for the External Azure Load Balancer
Choose between an existing or new public IP for the Active Fortigate
Choose between an existing or new public IP for the Passive Fortigate
Name of Public IP address element
Resource group to which the Public IP belongs
Name of Public IP address element
Resource group to which the Public IP belongs
Name of Public IP address element
Resource group to which the Public IP belongs
Identify whether to use a new or existing vnet
Name of the Azure virtual network
Resource Group containing the existing virtual network (with new vnet the current resourcegroup is used)
Virtual Network Address prefix
External Subnet
External Subnet Prefix
Internal Subnet
Internal Subnet Prefix
HA Sync Subnet 3 Name
HA Sync Subnet 3 Prefix
Management Subnet 4 Name
Management Subnet 4 Prefix
Protected A Subnet 5 Name
Protected A Subnet 5 Prefix
Protected B Subnet 6 Name
Protected B Subnet 6 Prefix
Identify whether to use a new or existing vnet
Name of the Azure virtual network for Spoke1
Resource Group containing the existing virtual network Spoke 1 (with new vnet the current resourcegroup is used)
Subnet 1 Spoke 1
Subnet 1 Spoke 1
Virtual Network Address prefix for Spoke 1
Identify whether to use a new or existing vnet
Name of the Azure virtual network for Spoke1
Resource Group containing the existing virtual network Spoke 1 (with new vnet the current resourcegroup is used)
Virtual Network Address prefix for Spoke 2
Subnet 1 Spoke 2
Subnet 1 Spoke 2
Location for all resources.

variables.fgaCustomData:
[base64(concat('config system sdn-connector
edit AzureSDN
set type azure
end
end
config router static
edit 1
set gateway ', variables('sn1GatewayIP'), '
set device port1
next
edit 2
set dst ', parameters('vnetAddressPrefix'), '
set gateway ', variables('sn2GatewayIP'), '
set device port2
next
edit 3
set dst 168.63.129.16 255.255.255.255
set device port2
set gateway ', variables ('sn2GatewayIP'), '
next
edit 4
set dst 168.63.129.16 255.255.255.255
set device port1
set gateway ', variables ('sn1GatewayIP'), '
next
edit 5
set dst ', parameters('vnetAddressPrefixSpoke1'), '
set gateway ', variables('sn2GatewayIP'), '
set device port2
set comment Spoke1-Subnet
next
edit 6
set dst ', parameters('vnetAddressPrefixSpoke2'), '
set gateway ', variables('sn2GatewayIP'), '
set device port2
set comment Spoke2-Subnet
next
end
config system probe-response
set http-probe-value OK
set mode http-probe
end
config system interface
edit port1
set mode static
set ip ',  variables('sn1IPfga'), '/', variables('sn1CIDRmask'), '
set description external
set allowaccess probe-response
next
edit port2
set mode static
set ip ', variables('sn2IPfga'), '/', variables('sn2CIDRmask'), '
set description internal
set allowaccess probe-response
next
edit port3
set mode static
set ip ', variables('sn3IPfga'), '/', variables('sn3CIDRmask'), '
set description hasyncport
next
edit port4
set mode static
set ip ', variables('sn4IPfga'), '/', variables('sn4CIDRmask'), '
set description hammgmtport
set allowaccess ping https ssh ftm
next
end
config firewall address
edit Spoke1-subnet
set associated-interface port2
set subnet ', parameters('subnet1Spoke1Prefix'), '
next
edit Spoke2-subnet
set associated-interface port2
set subnet ', parameters('subnet1Spoke2Prefix'), '
next
edit ProtectedASubnet
set associated-interface port2
set subnet ', parameters('subnet5Prefix'), '
next
edit ProtectedBSubnet
set associated-interface port2
set subnet ', parameters('subnet6Prefix'), '
next
end
config firewall policy
edit 1
set name Spoke1subnet-to-Spoke2subnet
set srcintf port2
set dstintf port2
set srcaddr Spoke1-subnet
set dstaddr Spoke2-subnet
set action accept
set schedule always
set service ALL
set fsso disable
next
edit 2
set name Spoke2subnet-to-Spoke1subnet
set srcintf port2
set dstintf port2
set srcaddr Spoke2-subnet
set dstaddr Spoke1-subnet
set action accept
set schedule always
set service ALL
set fsso disable
next
edit 3
set name SpokesSubnets-to-ProtectedSubnets
set srcintf port2
set dstintf port2
set srcaddr Spoke1-subnet Spoke2-subnet
set dstaddr ProtectedASubnet ProtectedBSubnet
set action accept
set schedule always
set service ALL
set fsso disable
next
edit 4
set name ProtectedSubnets-to-SpokeSubnets
set srcintf port2
set dstintf port2
set srcaddr ProtectedASubnet ProtectedBSubnet
set dstaddr Spoke1-subnet Spoke2-subnet
set action accept
set schedule always
set service ALL
set fsso disable
next
edit 5
set name Protected&SpokeSubnets-to-Internet
set srcintf port2
set dstintf port1
set srcaddr ProtectedASubnet ProtectedBSubnet Spoke1-subnet Spoke2-subnet
set dstaddr all
set action accept
set schedule always
set service ALL
set utm-status enable
set fsso disable
set av-profile default
set webfilter-profile default
set dnsfilter-profile default
set ips-sensor default
set application-list default
set ssl-ssh-profile certificate-inspection
set nat enable
next
end
config system ha
set group-name AzureHA
set mode a-p
set hbdev port3 100
set session-pickup enable
set session-pickup-connectionless enable
set ha-mgmt-status enable
config ha-mgmt-interfaces
edit 1
set interface port4
set gateway ', variables('sn4GatewayIP'),'
next
end
set override disable
set priority 255
set unicast-hb enable
set unicast-hb-peerip ', variables('sn3IPfgb'), '
 end'))]
variables.fgbCustomData:
[base64(concat('config system sdn-connector
edit AzureSDN
set type azure
end
end
config router static
edit 1
set gateway ', variables('sn1GatewayIP'), '
set device port1
next
edit 2
set dst ', parameters('vnetAddressPrefix'), '

set device port2
next
edit 3

set device port2
set gateway ', variables ('sn2GatewayIP'), '
next
edit 4
set dst 168.63.129.16 255.255.255.255
set device port1
set gateway ', variables ('sn1GatewayIP'), '
next
edit 5
set dst ', parameters('vnetAddressPrefixSpoke1'), '
set gateway ', variables('sn2GatewayIP'), '
set device port2
set comment Spoke1-Subnet
next
edit 6
set dst ', parameters('vnetAddressPrefixSpoke2'), '

set device port2
set comment Spoke2-Subnet
next

config system probe-response
set http-probe-value OK

end
config system interface
edit port1
set mode static
set ip ',  variables('sn1IPfgb'), '/', variables('sn1CIDRmask'), '
set description external
set allowaccess probe-response
next
edit port2
set mode static
set ip ', variables('sn2IPfgb'), '/', variables('sn2CIDRmask'), '
set description internal
set allowaccess probe-response
next
edit port3
set mode static
set ip ', variables('sn3IPfgb'), '/', variables('sn3CIDRmask'), '
set description hasyncport
next
edit port4

set ip ', variables('sn4IPfgb'), '/', variables('sn4CIDRmask'), '
set description hammgmtport
set allowaccess ping https ssh ftm
next

config firewall address
edit Spoke1-subnet
set associated-interface port2
set subnet ', parameters('subnet1Spoke1Prefix'), '
next
edit Spoke2-subnet
set associated-interface port2
set subnet ', parameters('subnet1Spoke2Prefix'), '
next
edit ProtectedASubnet
set associated-interface port2
set subnet ', parameters('subnet5Prefix'), '
next
edit ProtectedBSubnet
set associated-interface port2
set subnet ', parameters('subnet6Prefix'), '
next

config firewall policy
edit 1
set name Spoke1subnet-to-Spoke2subnet
set srcintf port2
set dstintf port2
set srcaddr Spoke1-subnet
set dstaddr Spoke2-subnet
set action accept
set schedule always
set service ALL

next
edit 2
set name Spoke2subnet-to-Spoke1subnet

set dstaddr Spoke1-subnet
set action accept
set schedule always
set service ALL
set fsso disable
next
edit 3
set name SpokesSubnets-to-ProtectedSubnets
set srcintf port2
set dstintf port2
set srcaddr Spoke1-subnet Spoke2-subnet
set dstaddr ProtectedASubnet ProtectedBSubnet
set action accept
set schedule always
set service ALL
set fsso disable
next
edit 4
set name ProtectedSubnets-to-SpokeSubnets
set srcintf port2
set dstintf port2
set srcaddr ProtectedASubnet ProtectedBSubnet
set dstaddr Spoke1-subnet Spoke2-subnet
set action accept
set schedule always
set service ALL
set fsso disable
next
edit 5
set name Protected&SpokeSubnets-to-Internet
set srcintf port2
set dstintf port1
set srcaddr ProtectedASubnet ProtectedBSubnet Spoke1-subnet Spoke2-subnet
set dstaddr all
set action accept
set schedule always
set service ALL
set utm-status enable
set fsso disable
set av-profile default
set webfilter-profile default
set dnsfilter-profile default
set ips-sensor default
set application-list default
set ssl-ssh-profile certificate-inspection
set nat enable
next
end
config system ha
set group-name AzureHA
set mode a-p
set hbdev port3 100
set session-pickup enable
set session-pickup-connectionless enable
set ha-mgmt-status enable
config ha-mgmt-interfaces
edit 1
set interface port4
set gateway ', variables('sn4GatewayIP'),'
next
end
set override disable
set priority 1
set unicast-hb enable
set unicast-hb-peerip ', variables('sn3IPfga'), '
 end'))]
